mapper.insert: insert into activity( activityid, organizationid, title, introduction, starttime, endtime, province, city, district, place, numberofrequiredvolunteer, numberofenrolledvolunteer, activestatusid, creationtime, enrolmentopeningtime, enrolmentdeadline, volunteerhours, pictureaddress, admissionpolicy, creditscorerequirement, leaveapproval, acstyle, havealeader )values( #{activityid}, #{organizationid}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{place}, #{numberofrequiredvolunteer}, #{numberofenrolledvolunteer}, 6, now(), #{enrolmentopeningtime}, #{enrolmentdeadline}, #{volunteerhours}, #{pictureaddress}, #{admissionpolicy}, #{creditscorerequirement}, #{leaveapproval}, #{acstyle}, #{havealeader} );
mapper.select: select * from activity where acstyle=#{acstyle} and activestatusid in (1,2,3) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 12;
select * from activity where activestatusid in (1,2,3) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 12;

select *,acstyle.acstyle as aa,admissionpolicy.admissionpolicy as admissionpolicys from activity , acstyle,admissionpolicy where activity.acstyle = acstyle.acstyleid and activity.admissionpolicy = admissionpolicy.admissionpolicyid and activity.activityid = #{activityid}

select *,areanew.whole_name,organization.oname,activestatus.`status`as acstatus,(select count(*) from signcode where activity.activityid = signcode.activityid ) as lon1 ,(select signinid from signcode where activity.activityid = signcode.activityid ) as lat1,(select count(*) from signrecord where aapplication.applicationid = signrecord.applicationid ) as cc ,(select count(*) from aleave where aapplication.applicationid = aleave.applicationid and statusid = 1 ) as zip,(select signintime from signrecord where signrecord.applicationid = aapplication.applicationid) as signintime ,(select count(*) from evaluation where evaluation.activityid = aapplication.activityid and evaluation.volunteerid = aapplication.volunteerid) as pp,(select leaveapplicationid from aleave where aleave.applicationid = aapplication.applicationid) as leaveapplicationid,(select aleave.applicationtime from aleave where aleave.applicationid = aapplication.applicationid) as applicationtime from activity, organization,areanew,aapplication,activestatus where activity.activityid = aapplication.activityid AND activity.organizationid = organization.organizationid AND activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid
and activity.activestatusid in (1,2)
and activity.activestatusid = 3
and activity.activestatusid = 4
and activity.activestatusid in (1,2,3,4)
and activity.district = areanew.area_code and areanew.`level` = 3 and aapplication.applicationstatusid = #{activity.applicationstatusid} and aapplication.volunteerid = #{activity.volunteerid} order by activity.creationtime limit #{begin},#{size};

select count(*) from activity, organization,areanew,aapplication,activestatus where activity.activityid = aapplication.activityid AND activity.organizationid = organization.organizationid AND activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid
and activity.activestatusid in (1,2)
and activity.activestatusid = 3
and activity.activestatusid = 4
and activity.activestatusid in (1,2,3,4)
and activity.district = areanew.area_code and areanew.`level` = 3 and aapplication.applicationstatusid = #{applicationstatusid} and aapplication.volunteerid = #{volunteerid}

select *,ac.acstyle as aa, ad.admissionpolicy as admissionpolicys from activity a LEFT JOIN organization o on a.organizationid = o.organizationid left join acstyle ac on a.acstyle = ac.acstyleid left join areanew ar on a.district = ar.area_code and ar.`level` = 3 left join admissionpolicy ad on a.admissionpolicy = ad.admissionpolicyid where a.activityid = #{activityid}

select *,organization.oname,areanew.whole_name,auditstatus.`status` as lon1 ,activestatus.`status` as acstatus from activity, organization,applicationreview,areanew,auditstatus,activestatus where activity.organizationid = organization.organizationid AND applicationreview.activityid = activity.activityid and auditstatus.auditstatusid = applicationreview.auditstatusid and activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid and activity.district = areanew.area_code
and applicationreview.auditstatusid = 1
and applicationreview.auditstatusid = 3
and applicationreview.auditstatusid in (3,4)
and applicationreview.volunteerid = #{activity.volunteerid} order by activity.starttime limit #{begin},#{size};

select count(*) from activity, organization,applicationreview,areanew,auditstatus,activestatus where activity.organizationid = organization.organizationid AND applicationreview.activityid = activity.activityid and auditstatus.auditstatusid = applicationreview.auditstatusid and activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid and activity.district = areanew.area_code
and applicationreview.auditstatusid = 1
and applicationreview.auditstatusid = 3
and applicationreview.auditstatusid in (3,4)
and applicationreview.volunteerid = #{volunteerid}

select *,areanew.whole_name,auditstatus.`status` as lon1 ,activestatus.`status` as acstatus,activityreview.auditid as acreviewsauditid,activityreview.eta as acreviewseta,activityreview.feedback as acreviewsfeedback,(select count(*) from signcode where signcode.activityid = activity.activityid) as cc,(select signinid from signcode where signcode.activityid = activity.activityid) as lat1 from activity,activityreview,areanew,acstyle,admissionpolicy,auditstatus,activestatus where activity.activityid = activityreview.activityid AND areanew.area_code = activity.district and areanew.`level` = 3 and activity.acstyle = acstyle.acstyleid and activity.admissionpolicy = admissionpolicy.admissionpolicyid and activityreview.auditstatusid = auditstatus.auditstatusid and activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 1 and activity.activestatusid = 6
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 2 and activity.activestatusid = 1
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 2 and activity.activestatusid = 2
and activity.activestatusid = 3
and activity.activestatusid = 4
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 3
and activity.organizationid = #{activity.organizationid}
order by activity.starttime limit #{begin},#{size};

select count(*) from activity,activityreview,areanew,acstyle,admissionpolicy,auditstatus,activestatus where activity.activityid = activityreview.activityid AND areanew.area_code = activity.district and areanew.`level` = 3 and activity.acstyle = acstyle.acstyleid and activity.admissionpolicy = admissionpolicy.admissionpolicyid and activityreview.auditstatusid = auditstatus.auditstatusid and activity.activestatusid = activestatus.activestatusid
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 1 and activity.activestatusid = 6
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 2 and activity.activestatusid = 1
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 2 and activity.activestatusid = 2
and activity.activestatusid = 3
and activity.activestatusid = 4
and activityreview.auditstatusid = 3
and activity.organizationid = #{organizationid}
